title: The Best Chicken Kiev Ever
ingredients: ['8 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '75g butter, softened', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons water', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '60g plain flour', '55g dry breadcrumbs', '475ml vegetable oil', '1/2 lemon, sliced', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
